Content:
Hi. Looking to upgrade the exhaust on my '98 V-Star 650. Considering a set of slip on mufflers.

Not looking to piss off the neighbors. Just looking for a step up from the factory exhaust.

Right now I'm leaning towards Cobra's but, I'm open to any and all suggestions, with the exception of drilling or modifying the stock exhaust.

Thanks!
